original_text: The king was very upset. He stood up and he tore his clothes. Then he lay down on the ground. All his servants were standing around him. They had torn their clothes, too.
korean_text: 왕이 곧 일어나서 자기의 옷을 찢고 땅에 드러눕고 그의 신하들도 다 옷을 찢고 모셔 선지라

sentences.original_text: Then he lay down on the ground.
All his servants were standing around him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 신하들이 그 주변에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had torn their clothes, too.
